title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\SetAddonsConfigRequest
name: SetAddonsConfigRequest
description:
SetAddonsConfigRequest sets the addons associated with the cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.SetAddonsConfigRequest

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: The name of the cluster to upgrade.

params.name: data.addons_config
params.description: The desired configurations for the various addons available to run in the cluster.
